text:
On your `<image/>` Tag you can place the attribute `loading="lazy"`.

You can set the image quality to low with HubSpot: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-pages-editor/customize-an-images-optimization-settings>

Async is an attribute for `<script/>` Tags, you only can set it to your custom scripts. Its not for the react assets loaded by HubSpot itself. Everything you load with Google-Tag-Manager is asyncron as well.

And  dont forget once the page assets are cached by the browser, the page speed load time goes up.

ps: Lighthouse is not always right.
